Package biosim.core.body.sensors

Interface Summary
AllVisibleSameType This sensor returns a list of all the visible agents of the same kind within a specified field-of-view and range.
AllVisibleSameTypeVecs This sensor returns a list of vectors to all the visible agents of the same kind within a specified field-of-view and range.
